website_summaries.verdict: Weighs under one pound, helping athletes focus on the game and not what they're wearing.
pros: Sturdy chrome-plated coverage can help instill confidence while on the field during practice and games
Arrives with all the necessary parts that produce a well-tuned piece of protective gear
High marks for its protective abilities

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, great fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a coach and ordered this for our son who’s the QB. So he knew what he was ordering and needed it quick. The only thing is that after it was opened he couldn’t find the hardware which wasn’t a huge issue. We might have accidentally thrown it away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Zeinert

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It’s protected me during football season saving me a lot of times from big hits overall pretty satisfied and would rate 5 stars. It also is stylish so that’s a plus
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you want your kid to be safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is the quarterback and after only two uses a broke in half! Not a great product for your loved ones who you’re trying to keep safe!
customer_reviews.author: D. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Back plate was in ok shape. Both screws were stripped when I took it out of the package. There are scratches all over the back plate. Not sure how or why. I bought a new item not a used item. Luckily the screws can easily be replaced. But as for the scratches not much I can do. My son has 4 games left so to return it and wait for another would be pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Leach

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Plate
customer_reviews.text: Great back plate, but they will break. My son is on his 3rd year with his 1st one even though it cracked. Ordered this one just in case the 1st one becomes unusable.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great add on the the shoulder pads for a reciever
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: This product has been amazing- even when the hit came that split the product in half - my son was good. That’s what it’s suppose to do- and it did.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this & has attached it to his football shoulder pads. He likes it, & it helps to protect him. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Hangs low
customer_reviews.text: May need to drill additional holes so it doesn’t hang too low
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool for a Football Player
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson who plays high school football. he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.
